paper_abstract: Unitary Equivalence and Translation Representation play a key role in the Lax Phillips Scattering Theory. In this paper we show that Translation Representation also plays an important role in Wavelet Theory, for Discrete Multi-Resolution Approximation as well as for Continuous Multi-Translation Approximation - to be defined in the paper.
paper_title: UNITARY EQUIVALENCE AND TRANSLATION REPRESENTATION IN WAVELET THEORY
